Name: El Presidente (with rhum agricole)
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist and mint leaf/sprig tip.
Express lime zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with mint leaf or sprig tip floated or pegged to rim.
Review: Rhum agricole adds distinctive grassy notes to this delicate Cuban classic.
History: El Presidente El Presidente (Sloppy Joes) El Presidente (sans grenadine El Presidente Menocal Special
Nutrition: One serving of El Presidente (with rhum agricole) contains 168 calories
